name: MADE MISTAKES
offense: 21 U.S.C. §§ 841(a)(1) & 841(b)(1)(B), Distribution of Cocaine, a Class B Felony.

offenseCharacteristics.baseOffense: Base Offense Level: The guideline for a 21 U.S.C. 841(a) offense is U.S.S.G. § 2D1.1 which, in this case provides a base offense level contingent on the amount of cocaine involved in the offense, 2.1 kilograms.  That base offense level is, per U.S.S.G. § 2D1.1(c)(7) is 26.                                                            26

specificOffenseCharacteristics.description:
Specific Offense Characteristics: Since the defendant possessed a dangerous weapon, 
specifically a stolen semiautomatic handgun, in relation to his drug offense U.S.S.G. 
2D1.1(b)(1) requires two offense levels be added.                 2
